title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Updated
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the interactive simulation assistant for virtual reality training. This includes desired features, target audience (educators, trainees in specific industries), use cases (various training scenarios), technical constraints (hardware compatibility, software limitations), integration with existing LMS systems (e.g., Moodle, Canvas), security considerations (data privacy, authentication mechanisms), performance requirements (minimum frame rate, latency limits), scalability needs (number of concurrent users, expansion to multiple platforms), potential future enhancements (VR headset upgrades, haptic feedback integration), user experience design (intuitive interfaces, accessibility features), and accessibility in the design (support for color blindness, hearing impairment).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components for virtual reality simulation, real-time interaction, and training content management.

title: Develop Virtual Reality Simulation Engine
description: Implement the core virtual reality simulation engine, including rendering, physics, and user interaction.

title: Develop Training Content Management System
description: Develop a system for creating, managing, and delivering interactive training content for the virtual reality simulations.

title: Implement Real-Time Interaction and Communication
description: Develop the functionality for real-time interaction and communication between the trainer and trainees within the virtual reality environment.

title: Design User Interface and Experience (Revised & Prioritized)
description: In this revised task, we aim to design an intuitive, efficient, accessible, and user-friendly interface and experience for both trainers and trainees within the virtual reality-based training platform. The design will take into account various user roles, accessibility guidelines, usability best practices, project scope, requirements, branding, and visual identity. It will align with the overall project vision and be flexible enough to accommodate future updates. Upon completion, comprehensive documentation of the design decisions and interface elements will be provided. To ensure a smooth operation within the VR environment, we recommend considering performance aspects during the design process. The revised design prioritizes usability, accessibility, and flexibility. We request feedback on this updated description, specifically focusing on the following areas: 1) Clarify if the design should also take into account the performance aspect to ensure smooth operation within the VR environment. 2) Highlight any potential areas that require unique considerations due to the nature of the VR-based training platform (e.g., motion sickness, spatial disorientation). 3) Suggest any additional dependencies or related tasks that need to be considered for a comprehensive design, such as feedback mechanisms, interaction design, and error handling strategies. We will then address your feedback before moving forward. After addressing your feedback, we would like the task to be moved to the 'Implementation' state.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance plan to ensure the system meets the defined requirements and functions as expected.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system architecture, APIs, and development processes for future reference and maintenance.
